entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Port Alberni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:10 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Alberni 5:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: NNW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain at times heavy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain at times heavy changing to rain in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
